alert.note: Alert for Delaware; Otsego (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 30 at 5:19PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of east central Otsego and northwestern Delaware Counties through 545 PM EDT... At 519 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Meridale to near Walton. Movement was northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Walton, Delhi, Davenport, Colchester, Kortright, Meredith, Hamden, Meridale, East Meredith and Butts Corner. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy rainfall is also occurring with these storms.
